articles.authorDescription: Thảo Nguyên, born in Hanoi, Vietnam, moved to Germany, where she now works as a bilingual host (MC) and wedding speaker for Vietnamese couples. With her deep connection to both cultures, she helps couples create unique wedding ceremonies by blending Vietnamese traditions with German customs.

aria.heroPhoto: Portrait of Thảo Nguyên working as a host.

default.title: Wedding Hosting & Bilingual Event Moderation in German & Vietnamese – Thảo Nguyên
default.keywords: MC, Wedding Hosting, Wedding Speaker, Bilingual Wedding Speaker, Host, Event, Wedding, Vietnamese, German, German-Vietnamese, Bilingual, Celebration, Gala, Ceremony, Birthday, Vietnamese-German, Bilingual Wedding Speaker for Weddings, Wedding MC Vietnam-Germany, Ceremony Leader for Vietnamese Weddings, Wedding MC in German and Vietnamese, Bilingual Event Hosting, Wedding Speaker in Berlin for Vietnamese Weddings, Gala and Event Host
default.description: Professional hosting and wedding ceremonies for weddings, birthdays, gala evenings, and more. Thảo Nguyên hosts in German and Vietnamese, ensuring all guests are linguistically and emotionally engaged – for unforgettable events.
